content.question: The quotation marks around the word “disrespect” in line 72 highlight the irony of the word because the behavior it describes represents

choices.label: supposed adults’ deferential treatment of children
parents’ lighthearted attempts to play with their offspring
children’s eager mockery of adults’ behavior
children’s inevitable reaction to being treated rudely by adults

content.answer: children’s inevitable reaction to being treated rudely by adults
